meanings.definition: Bangkok - the capital and largest city of Thailand
meanings.sent1: I dream of visiting the bustling city of bangkoks one day.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists enjoy exploring the vibrant streets of bangkoks.
meanings.sent3: After a long journey, we finally arrived in bangkoks and felt the energy of the city.
meanings.sent4: The heart of bangkoks beats with the rhythm of a thriving metropolis.
meanings.sent5: The skyline of bangkoks is a sight to behold, with towering skyscrapers reaching for the sky.

meanings.definition: Bangkok - a type of spicy Thai cuisine
meanings.sent1: I love the flavorful taste of bangkoks in my dishes.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant is known for its authentic bangkoks that pack a punch.
meanings.sent3: The spicy bangkoks made my taste buds dance with delight.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sizzling bangkoks filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.
meanings.sent5: A bowl of hot bangkoks is perfect for warming up on a chilly day.

meanings.sent1: The bustling streets of bangkoks are always filled with life.
meanings.sent2: Local markets in bangkoks offer a variety of goods and produce.
meanings.sent3: I got lost in the maze of streets in bangkoks but enjoyed every moment.
meanings.sent4: The spirit of bangkoks can be felt in the laughter of its people.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the hidden gems of bangkoks is a delightful adventure.

meanings.definition: Bangkok - a type of massage therapy
meanings.sent1: After a long day, a relaxing bangkoks is the perfect way to unwind.
meanings.sent2: The spa offers traditional bangkoks that soothe both the body and mind.
meanings.sent3: I felt rejuvenated after experiencing the healing touch of a bangkoks.
meanings.sent4: The gentle strokes of the bangkoks melted away all my stress.
meanings.sent5: A professional bangkoks can work wonders for tired muscles.

meanings.definition: Bangkok - a type of street food in Thailand
meanings.sent1: The aroma of sizzling bangkoks fills the air in the bustling market.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to trying different varieties of bangkoks from street vendors.
meanings.sent3: Eating bangkoks from a food cart is a delicious and authentic experience.
meanings.sent4: The sizzling sound of bangkoks being cooked on the grill is music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: The flavors of traditional bangkoks transport me back to the streets of Thailand.
